import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { User } from '../api/types' import Field from '../private/Field' const UserItem = (props: User) => { const [author, setAuthor] = useState(null) return (
{author.name} {author.email} {author.company.name} {author.phone} {author.address.street} - {author.address.city} - {author.address.zipcode}
) } export default UserItem
